title: Victoria's first settlers
creator_credit: Lili Steiner and Victoria. Ministry of Education
brief_description: The state historian of Victoria Mr Bernard Barrett talks to Trevor Lunn about Victoria’s Aboriginal past, the first British visitors, sealers and whalers and the settlements at Portland and Melbourne.
